<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



获取单个交易对的指数价格

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"client-ip","in":"header","description":"client-ip","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"symbol","in":"query","description":"交易对","required":true,"style":"form","allowReserved":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"CommonResponse«PriceVO»","type":"object","properties":{"error":{"title":"ErrorMessage","type":"object","properties":{"args":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}},"code":{"type":"string"},"msg":{"type":"string"}}},"msgInfo":{"type":"string"},"result":{"title":"PriceVO","type":"object","properties":{"p":{"type":"number","description":"价格","format":"bigdecimal"},"s":{"type":"string","description":"交易对"},"t":{"type":"integer","description":"时间","format":"int64"}}},"returnCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
